tool_description: Track the performance of your advertising with instantly activated tracking numbers in 30 countries. Integrate with Google and track down to keyword level.
name: CallTrackingMetrics
title: CallTrackingMetrics

api_list.name: GET Call Detail
DELETE Delete a WebHook
GET Calls
api_list.description: The Calls API allows you easy access to all your call data. You can subscribe to new incoming calls to receive an HTTP request when a call is completed. You can also query the call API to retrieve all past calls.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page offset to query

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: a search string to look for calls with specific callerid, caller_number, called_number, source name, etc...

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: a starting date offset to query

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: a ending date offset to query

api_list.name: List Numbers
api_list.description: The numbers API allows you to search, purchase, and manage settings on each tracking number.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page offset to query

api_list.name: List Text Messages
api_list.description: The SMS API allows you to search, send, and manage text messaging triggers for all capable numbers.

api_list.name: List Accounts
api_list.description: The accounts API allows you to create and manage accounts.

api_list.name: List Users
api_list.description: The users API allows you to create and manage users.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: the page offset to query

api_list.name: Search Numbers

required_parameters.name: area_code
required_parameters.description: an area code to search and match on

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: the country where you would like to purchase this number. currently supported countries include "US" and "CA"

api_list.name: Add Receiving Number

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: this is the receiving number, where you would like phone calls to be forwarded once received by the tracking number.

api_list.name: Add Account

required_parameters.name: account[name]
required_parameters.description: the name for the new account

required_parameters.name: billing_type
required_parameters.description: the type of billing for this account either, existing or new, when new is selected additional payment profile options are required.

optional_parameters.name: account[payment_profiles_attributes][0][address]
optional_parameters.description: new billing address

optional_parameters.name: account[payment_profiles_attributes][0][city]
optional_parameters.description: new billing city

optional_parameters.name: account[payment_profiles_attributes][0][zip]
optional_parameters.description: new billing postal code

optional_parameters.name: account[payment_profiles_attributes][0][country]
optional_parameters.description: new billing country, e.g. "United States", "Canada", "Mexico", "United Kingdom", etc...

optional_parameters.name: account[payment_profiles_attributes][0][first_name]
optional_parameters.description: first name on credit card

optional_parameters.name: account[payment_profiles_attributes][0][card_type]
optional_parameters.description: type of credit card one of visa, master, american_express, or discover.

optional_parameters.name: account[payment_profiles_attributes][0][card_number]
optional_parameters.description: credit card number

optional_parameters.name: account[payment_profiles_attributes][0][verification_value]
optional_parameters.description: credit card verification number

optional_parameters.name: account[payment_profiles_attributes][0][month]
optional_parameters.description: credit card expiration month

optional_parameters.name: account[payment_profiles_attributes][0][year]
optional_parameters.description: credit card expiration year

api_list.name: Add Role

required_parameters.name: role
required_parameters.description: how the user can access the account, 'admin', 'report_manager', 'report_viewer'

required_parameters.name: account_id
required_parameters.description: the account_id to grant this user access.

api_list.name: Add Tracking Source

optional_parameters.name: ref_pattern
optional_parameters.description: A pattern to match on the referring website for matching the current visitor. e.g. document.referrer.  This should be a valid regular expression without the leading / and trailing /

optional_parameters.name: url_pattern
optional_parameters.description: A pattern to match on the current website location for the current visitor. e.g. window.location  This should be a valid regular expression without the leading / and trailing /

optional_parameters.name: position
optional_parameters.description: A numeric value to indicate how this source should be evaluated with respect to all other sources. Lower values have higher precedence.

api_list.name: Add User
Buy Number
api_list.description: Request paramaters are sent via an HTTP POST and should be URL Encoded.

required_parameters.name: phone_number
required_parameters.description: the full number to purchase, this is the phone_number from the search API

api_list.name: POST Create a Webhook
POST FormReactor Webhook
api_list.description: Allow any service to start a FormReactor call flow. This will save data into the call log as a Form Lead as well as trigger a phone call to the designated Sales phone number.

api_list.name: POST Modify Call Data
POST SMS Triggers
api_list.description: Triggers allow you to define how to react when receiving a text message. Should we auto respond with a message, forward the message to another phone, send an email etc...

api_list.name: POST Sale Record

optional_parameters.name: score
optional_parameters.description: a number between 1 and 5 to indicate the quality of the call.

optional_parameters.name: value
optional_parameters.description: a numeric value to represent, the total worth of the call in dollars.

optional_parameters.name: conversion
optional_parameters.description: a boolean flag (1 or 0) to indicate whether the call resulted in a sale.

optional_parameters.name: sale_date
optional_parameters.description: when a sale occurred as a result of this call.

optional_parameters.name: service_rep_name
optional_parameters.description: The name of the person who handled the call.

api_list.name: Sending SMS Text Messages

required_parameters.name: msg
required_parameters.description: the text message to send, limited to 160 characters

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: tracking_number_id, the ID of the tracking number e.g. TPN...

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: destination phone number, the digits of the phone number e.g. +1dddddddddd

required_parameters.name: status
required_parameters.description: a status call back is a web request we can send you after the message has been delivered. e.g. http://example.com/your-web-service
